document_data.mainbody:
Dekanter was a famous explorer miner, whose endeavors commenced off the Silver Age of Netheril.
In the , Dekanter discovered great wealth of valuable minerals beneath the Greypeak Mountains for the empire of Netheril. Among the riches found beneath the mountains were veins of iron, silver, gold, platinum, and mercury. The mines of Dekanter were formed in his name, Thus began the Silver Age of Netheril.
